broker.name: The Ear
broker.description: A shadowy figure in the corner who seems to know more than he lets on.

dialogue.intro: Information is the only real currency out here. Caps rust, bullets miss... but information? information is forever.
dialogue.sold_out: I'd love to take your scrip, but I've told you everything worth knowing around here.
dialogue.success_prefix: Here's the dossier. Study it closely:

innkeeper.name: Bartender
innkeeper.description: Wiping a glass that will never be clean.

dialogue.intro: Welcome to The Salty Atom. We got beds. They ain't soft or clean, but they're safer than outside.
dialogue.warning: WARNING: Sleeping advances the day cycle. Contracts may expire.
dialogue.success: You slept through the night and feel Well Rested (+25% XP next Raid).
